author: potuz
content: <@!449019668296892420> I think I got to the limit of what I can do in my implementation, wanted to test against yours: but hitting make tries to build the nim compiler, canÂ´t  it use the system one? and also do you have the patch you did the other day to nmcli to time the hashing part?

author: potuz
content: alright, compiling here I get a 271ms  with `ncli` on that same state, but this includes deserialization, so I'm guessing about `250` ms for the hashing. Seems that learning nim would be some leap for me to just add the timers, so I'll wait to see if you still have that patch.

author: potuz
content: I managed to get about 165ms with my single threaded implementation, so I'm quite pleased with it.
